p: Between May and July 2018, a daily average of about 22% of the NH AgPop area experienced a heat wave (Figure 4a). This extreme spatial extent of the GCWH18 event is unprecedented in the observational record when considering heat wave between May and July and nearly 8% larger then the second largest event of this kind in 2012. Computing the concurrent hot day area between May and August, 2010 and 2018 have a similar extent (23% and 22%; Figure S2a) and also for May to September (both 21%; Figure S2b).
